xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: If anybody is eliminated with anything but katana, shuriken or in accidents, mission will fail
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: A safe has been added in the medical staff sleep quarters
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS:
Eliminate Akira Nakamura within 60 seconds of picking up the safe contents.
If he is eliminated before picking up the contents, or if his unconcious body is dumped in a container, mission will fail.
xx.3AB1E1F5: Eliminate Akira Nakamura while disguised as ninja or motorcyclist
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Once you equip Amos Dexter's disguise, you cannot change disguises again, or mission will fail.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Another disguise was equipped while already disguised as Amos Dexter
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: Helicopter Pilot disguise can be worn once, and for 60 seconds only.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Eliminate all targets while disguised as yellow biker or ninja.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
When somebody enters 47's suite, they become targets.
All trespassers must be eliminated before you can exit the level.
xx.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Eliminate two targets with one bullet from the Striker

en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: If anybody is eliminated with anything but a katana, shuriken or in accidents, mission will fail.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: A safe has been added in the medical staff sleep quarters.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS:
Eliminate Akira Nakamura within 60 seconds of picking up the safe's contents.
If he is eliminated before picking up the contents, or if his unconscious body is dumped in a container, you will fail the mission.
en.3AB1E1F5: Eliminate Akira Nakamura while disguised as a ninja or motorcyclist
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Once you equip Amos Dexter's disguise, you cannot change disguises again, or mission will fail.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Another disguise was equipped while already disguised as Amos Dexter
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: Helicopter Pilot disguise can be worn once, and for 60 seconds only.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Eliminate all targets while disguised as the motorcyclist or the ninja.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
When somebody enters 47's suite, they become targets.
All trespassers must be eliminated before you can exit the level.
en.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Eliminate two targets with one bullet from the Striker

fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: Si quelqu'un est tué autrement qu'au katana, au shuriken ou dans un accident, la mission échouera.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: Un coffre-fort a été installé dans les quartiers d'habitation du personnel médical
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS:
Éliminez Akira Nakamura moins de 60 secondes après avoir récupéré le contenu du coffre-fort.
S'il est éliminé avant que vous n'ayez récupéré les documents, ou neutralisé et caché dans un conteneur, la mission échouera.
fr.3AB1E1F5: Éliminez Akira Nakamura déguisé en ninja ou en motard
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Une fois déguisé en Amos Dexter, ne changez plus de déguisement ou la mission échouera.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Vous avez changé de déguisement alors que vous étiez déjà en Amos Dexter.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: Le déguisement de pilote d'hélicoptère ne peut être porté qu'une fois et pendant 60 secondes.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ADDED_CAMERAS_D: Des caméras de surveillance supplémentaires ont été installées.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Éliminez toutes les cibles, déguisé en ninja ou en motard.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
Toutes les personnes qui pénètrent dans la suite de 47 deviennent des cibles.
Tous les intrus doivent être éliminés pour que vous puissiez quitter le niveau.
fr.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Éliminez deux cibles avec une seule balle de Striker.

it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: Se qualcuno viene eliminato con una tecnica che non preveda l'uso di katana, shuriken o incidenti, la missione fallirà.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: È stata aggiunta una cassaforte nel dormitorio del personale medico
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS: Elimina Akira Nakamura entro 60 secondi dal furto del contenuto della cassaforte. Se lo eliminerai prima di aver recuperato il contenuto od occulterai il suo corpo in un contenitore mentre è privo di sensi, la missione fallirà.
it.3AB1E1F5: Elimina Akira Nakamura mentre sei travestito da ninja o da motociclista
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Non potrai più cambiare travestimento dopo aver indossato gli abiti di Dexter. Se lo farai, la missione fallirà.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Hai indossato un altro travestimento mentre eri travestito da Amos Dexter.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: Il travestimento da pilota di elicottero può essere indossato una sola volta, per un massimo di 60 secondi.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ADDED_CAMERAS_D: Sono state installate telecamere di sorveglianza aggiuntive.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Elimina i bersagli mentre sei travestito da motociclista o da ninja.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
Chiunque entri nella suite di 47 diventa un bersaglio.
Elimina tutti gli intrusi prima di uscire dal livello.
it.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Elimina due bersagli con un singolo proiettile del Striker

de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: Wenn Sie jemanden mit etwas anderem als Katana, Wurfstern oder durch einen Unfall eliminieren, scheitert die Mission.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: Den Schlafquartieren des medizinischen Personals wurde ein Tresor hinzugefügt.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS:
Eliminieren Sie Akira Nakamura innerhalb von 60 Sekunden, nachdem Sie den Inhalt des Tresors an sich genommen haben.
Wird er vorher eliminiert oder sein Körper in einen Behälter geworfen, ist die Mission gescheitert.
de.3AB1E1F5: Eliminieren Sie Akira Nakamura als Ninja oder Biker
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Sobald Sie sich als Amos Dexter verkleiden, kann die Verkleidung nicht mehr gewechselt werden, sonst scheitert die Mission.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Sie haben als Amos Dexter verkleidet eine andere Verkleidung ausgerüstet
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: Helikopterpiloten-Verkleidung kann nur einmal 60 Sekunden lang getragen werden.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Eliminieren Sie alle Ziele als Ninja oder Biker verkleidet.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
Wenn jemand die Suite von 47 betritt, wird er zum Ziel.
Alle Unbefugten müssen eliminiert werden, bevor Sie das Level verlassen können.
de.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Eliminieren Sie zwei Ziele mit einer Kugel der Striker.

es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_GLOBAL_ONLY_KATANA_SHURI: Si eliminas a alguien con algo que no sea una katana, shuriken o accidentes, la misión fracasará.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_SAFE_SLEEP_QUAR: Se ha añadido una caja fuerte a los dormitorios del personal médico.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_CASCADE_KOSUMOS:
Elimina a Akira Nakamura en menos de 60 segundos después de coger el contenido de la caja fuerte.
Si es eliminado antes de coger el contenido o si tiras su cuerpo inconsciente a un contenedor, la misión fracasará.
es.3AB1E1F5: Elimina a Akira Nakamura disfrazado de ninja o de motociclista.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_D: Una vez te pongas el disfraz de Amos Dexter, no podrás cambiar de disfraz, o la misión fracasará.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_STICKY_DEXTER_F: Te has puesto otro disfraz estando ya disfrazado de Amos Dexter
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_NAILS_HOT_DISGU: El disfraz de piloto de helicóptero puede equiparse solo una vez y solo durante 60 segundos.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ADDED_CAMERAS_D: Se han añadido más cámaras de vigilancia.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_ELIMINATE_IN_NI: Elimina a todos los objetivos disfrazado de ninja o motociclista.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_TRESPASSERS_DES:
Si alguien entra en la habitación de 47 se convertirá en un objetivo.
Para poder salir del nivel tendrás que eliminar a los intrusos.
es.UI_GAMECHANGERS_HOKKAIDO_COWBOY_DOUBLE_K: Elimina dos objetivos con una bala del Striker.
